Package IO


Interface InputSource (top level class for various input sources)

Member Function Index

FunctionDescription
getBaseURI Get the base URI

getBaseURI

Name getBaseURI
Interface InputSource
Purpose Get the base URI
Prototype   oratext* getBaseURI() { return baseURI; }
Arguments void
Returns (oratext*) base URI
Description Gets the base URI. It is used by some input sources such as File and URI

Interface InputSource

Arguments
